sentences.sContent: Mazie’s fur collar was tickling her neck.
sentences.sCn: 马齐耶的毛领子扎得她脖子痒痒的。

words.tran: 不安定的，不稳定的；难对付的；易倒的；易痒的；忌讳的
滴答响的东西；自动收报机；钟表；断续器
难题；使人痒的东西或人；备忘录；使人高兴的人或物

trans.tranOther: if something touching your body tickles you, it makes you want to rub your body because it is slightly uncomfortable

trans.tranCn: 胳肢；痒感；使人发痒、高兴的东西
trans.tranOther: a feeling in your throat that makes you want to cough
